Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Editorial \Ed`i*to"ri*al\, n. A leading article in a newspaper or magazine; an editorial article; an article published as an expression of the views of the editor. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Editorial \Ed`i*to"ri*al\, a. Of or pertaining to an editor; written or sanctioned by an editor; as, editorial labors; editorial remarks. [1913 Webster]

editorial adj 1: of or relating to an article stating opinions or giving perspectives; "editorial column" 2: relating to or characteristic of an editor; "editorial duties" n : an article giving opinions or perspectives [syn: {column}, {newspaper column}]
